title: Tankard
description: tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, brown glaze body, decorated with scattered white rosettes and blue medallions, and a coat of arms, all stamped, stamped rows of beading at neck and base, rim and handle of tankard unglazed, slightly domed pewter lid with floral band in repousse, plain ball thumbpiece on raised stem, German, XVIIIc NO DIMS. ON CAT. CARDS
